title: Assigning ringtones to specific Contacts
content:
I use my Pixel 3 for work and personal comms. I have set up contact lists (Friends, Customers, Suppliers) and was wondering if I can assign different ringtones for each group (Pixel calls it "Labels") so I can tell by the ringtone what type of call is incoming.

As I have over 1200 contacts in my phone I would rather not have to go to each one and manually set the ringtone, thank you very much.
